properties.verseOrder: c1 c2 v1 c1 c2 v2 c1 c2 v3 c1 c2

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Tumeingia kwako Bwana Mungu hono!
Tumeingia kwako Bwana Mungu hono!
Abiro iri jaela Yesus kadiromnwa,
Mungu utupokee kwako

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
Tumeingia kwako Bwana Mungu hono!
Tumeingia kwako Bwana Mungu hono!
Abiro iri jaela Yesus kadiromnwa,
Mungu utupokee kwako
aeeee a aeeee, hono.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Nyumba ya Bwana kuna baraka a aeee.
(tukaingie nyumba ya Bwana tukamwabudu)
a aeeeeee a aeee, hono.
Nyumba ya Bwana kuna amani a aeee
Tukaingie nyumba ya Bwana tukamwabudu
a aeee aeee - hono.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Nyumba ya Bwana kuna furaha, a aeee
(tukaingie nyumba ya Bwana tumpe sifa)
a aeeee a aeee, hono.
Tangazeni wokovu wa Bwana a aeee
Yeye ni Bwana muumba vyote Mfalme wetu
a aeeee a aeeee hono.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Unatawala dunia yote a aeee
Bwana ingia rohoni mwangu ukatawale
a aeee a aeee hono.
chuki na wivu niondolee a aeee
nimebebana na masengenyo dhidi ya watu
a aeeeee a aeeee, hono.
